Summary: Large object glowing bright green in colour
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hartlepool
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out walking my dog, i had only just walked maybe 100yds,1stly i heard a droning sound coming from somewhere, i maynot have noticed it if it wasn't for my dog max stood looking up in the air.As i looked up it was huge about the size of maybe 2 or 3 houses put together, bright illuminouse green in colour and it made a noise, it seemed to be hovering above my head and it seemed so low that i could reach out and touch it.but maybe that was an optical illussion as it was hard to say how low it was because of the illumination of it, i was 1stly filled full of awe,then as it started to move away, very slowly, then it just moved so fast it dissapeared ito the night i because petrified, i dragged my dog home and when't all around the house locking all my doors and windows. I have never been so afraid in all my life as i was that evening.
